sentences.en: Flour, , milk, butter and yeast are some ingredients in bread.
sentences.cn: 面粉、牛奶、黄油和酵母是做面包的一些原料。

sentences.en: Flour, liquid, salt, and yeast are constituent parts of bread.
sentences.cn: 面粉, 水, 盐和酵粉是面包的组成成分.

sentences.en: German beer has traditionally been made from just four ingredients — hops, malt, yeast and water.
sentences.cn: 德国啤酒传统上只用4种原料——啤酒花、麦芽、酵母和水。

sentences.en: However in another book I found a graph showing yeast cell population growth and specific gravity plotted against time .
sentences.cn: 然而，在另一本书，我发现一个图表显示人口增长与酵母细胞比重密谋对付时间。

sentences.en: I take wheat and yeast tablets daily to purify the blood.
sentences.cn: 我每天服用干酵母片以净化血液。

sentences.en: Sometimes the yeast within a writer outlives a book he has written.
sentences.cn: 有时一本书写完了而作者的内心仍然激动不己.

sentences.en: Stir in 1 level teaspoon of yeast.
sentences.cn: 加入一平茶匙的酵母后搅拌。

sentences.en: The vacuoles of yeast cells represents persistent organelles.
sentences.cn: 酵母细胞的液泡是永久性的细胞器.

sentences.en: This excess fungal yeast irritates the scalp, causing overproduction of skin cells.
sentences.cn: 这过量的真菌酵母刺激皮肤产生了过多的皮肤细胞.

sentences.en: To serve the needs of bakers, manufacturers ferment the yeast to produce a more concentrated product.
sentences.cn: 为了满足面包店主的需要，制造商让酵母发酵，以生产出浓度更高的产品。

sentences.en: Work the flour and yeast mixture together until you have a sticky dough.
sentences.cn: 将面粉和酵母混在一起和成黏糊糊的面团。

sentences.en: Yeast acts on dough and makes it rise.
sentences.cn: 酵母对面团发生作用,使其膨胀.

sentences.en: Yeast can be used in making beer and bread.
sentences.cn: 酵母可用于酿啤酒和发面包.

sentences.en: You mix flour, yeast and water to make bread.
sentences.cn: 你把面粉 、 发酵粉和水和在一起就能做面包.

words.tran_cn: 酵母的；起泡沫的；会发酵的；动荡的
[微]酵母；泡沫；酵母片；引起骚动因素

trans.tran_cn: 酵母（菌），酵母粉，酵母饼，酵母片，泡，泡沫，动乱，激动
trans.tran_en: a type of fungus used for producing alcohol in beer and wine, and for making bread rise
